item.title: ​Bamber Bridge looking to leapfrog above Stockton into a play-off place
item.description: Bamber Bridge will move into the NPL Premier Division play-offs this weekend if they defeat the team directly above them in the table – Stockton Town – at the Sir Tom Finney Stadium. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Luke Littler sends special message to Penwortham school pioneering a darts academy
item.description: World Champion darts star Luke Littler has delivered a special message to pupils at Penwortham Priory Academy. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Work finally begins at former Penwortham pub site - this is what is planned
item.description: Almost four years since the site was bulldozed, work has finally started on redeveloping a Penwortham pub and restaurant site. Source: LEP Preston
